channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: '4B' movement: Liberal women launch sex strike after Trump win
item.description: A number of feminists are going on a sex strike in retaliation for Donald Trump's presidential victory.

item.title: Culture Did A Way Better Job Of Signaling Trump’s Win Than Broken Polls

item.title: Laughter Might Be The Best Way To Respond To 2024’s Amazing Election Results
item.description: Nobody should feel sorry for the wretched degenerates who trafficked in the most poisonous political lies of our lifetime.

item.title: Sweden Warns Parents: Quit Plopping Your Baby In Front Of Brain-Rotting Screens
item.description: When screen time is eliminated or reduced, children have more time to be outside, interact in person, and, critically, sleep.
